title: The ‘Magnificent 7’ stocks are dying, and Wall Street is pretty happy about it
full_text: The ‘Magnificent 7’ stocks are dying, and Wall Street is pretty happy about it. But the dominance of the Mag 7 is likely to come to an end this year, many on Wall Street believe—if only because their valuations can’t exponentially go up .... The S&P 500 fell 0.19% yesterday but, interestingly, the equal weight S&P 500 (a notional index that values each stock equally) was marginally up. Thats because more investors are picking bet… [+2526 chars]
